channel.title: Client backround [FIXED]
channel.description:
Hi, i have a problem with the client background... There are the flames from original backround and the runescape logo, and i think, because of the flames, there is this leg not in the right place... [url=http://www.imagebanana.com/view/furqv4r/untitled.jpg.png]http://www.imagebanana.com/view/furqv4r/untitled.jpg.png[/url]
I cant find nowhere the sprites for the logo and the fire, so i dont know, for what to search in the code...
i use pk planet client v6
sry for my bad english

item.title: Client backround [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Axigan Axigan
item.description:
@Axigan wrote:

For all who have the same problem:

for the flames go to client.java (client) and search for

method58(25106); method58(25106);
and replace it with this:

//method58(25106); //method58(25106);

for the logo search in client.java (client) for

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 0)

and replace it with:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 1)

(Its not from me, i copied it from other posts, so no credits to me)

Read full topic
